Title: Shepherds pie
Instructions: Cook the rice in a large saucepan of boiling water for 12 minutes or until tender. Drain and leave to cool.

Heat oil in nonstick wok or large frying pan over medium heat. Add eggs . Swirl over base to form an omelette. Cook for 2 minutes or until set. Transfer to a chopping board. Set aside to cool slightly. Cut into short strips.

Add bacon to wok. Cook 4 minutes until light golden. Add carrot . Stir fry 1 minute. Add shallots , peas and rice. Cook, stirring, 3 to 4 minutes. Add egg and soy sauce . Stir until heated through. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and top with extra shallots . Serve immediately.

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, or more as needed
Title: French Toast
Instructions: Whisk milk, eggs, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt together.
Lightly butter a griddle and heat over medium-high heat.
Dunk bread in the egg mixture, soaking both sides.
Transfer to the hot skillet and cook
